title: Halo 3
message: Some of Halo 3's playlists require DLC to play. To download the appropriate content, head to the Xbox LIVE Marketplace. Additionally, be sure to check out Halo 4, which offers competitive War Games Multiplayer, Spartan Ops missions, and the continuation of the story of the Master Chief - available in Games on Demand!|n|nFor everything Halo, head to HaloWaypoint.com.|n|nSee you on the virtual battlefield. - 343 Industries
